00080017.name: AcquisitionUID
00080017.description: Unique identification of the single continuous gathering of data over a period of time that resulted in this instance.

00200012.name: AcquisitionNumber
00200012.description: A number identifying the single continuous gathering of data over a period of time that resulted in this instance.

00080022.name: AcquisitionDate
00080022.description: The date the acquisition of data that resulted in this instance started.

00080032.name: AcquisitionTime
00080032.description: The time the acquisition of data that resulted in this instance started.

0008002A.name: AcquisitionDateTime
0008002A.description: The date and time that the acquisition of data that resulted in this instance started.

00189073.name: AcquisitionDuration
00189073.description: Duration of the single continuous gathering of data over a period of time that resulted in this instance, in seconds.

00201002.name: ImagesInAcquisition
00201002.description: Number of images that resulted from this acquisition of data.

00083010.name: IrradiationEventUID
00083010.description: Unique identification of the irradiation event(s) associated with the acquisition of this instance.
